description.para: This boolean parameter controls whether smbd 8 will announce support for SMB3 persistent file handles.

In order for smbd to hand out persistent handles on a share, that share must be made continuously available by setting yes. Note that like durable handles, persistent handles are only enabled if additionally no, no, and no, i.e. if the share is configured for SMB only access, not supporting interoperability features with local UNIX processes or NFS operations.
This parameter has been added with Samba version 4.4.
Warning: This feature is experimental in Samba 4.4 and not meant for production use!
